title: Add a nft collection to Authentic NFT Collections
description: Someone requested to add a nft collection to Authentic NFT Collections

descriptions: Select this if you think the nft collection complies with the required criteria and should be added.
Select this if you think the nft collection does not comply with the required criteria and should not be added.

question: Does the nft collection comply with the required criteria?

metadata.tcrDescription: A list of authentic NFT collections.

columns.label: Thumbnail

columns.label: Chain ID
